2-Year Warranty The Two (2) Year Limited Warranty applies to purchases made from authorized channels of Mokwheel. Click here for more information.

settings.subtext: This 750W (1150W peak power) high-performance motor is designed for users who demand top-tier performance on any terrain. It offers unmatched acceleration and hill-climbing ability.
Stay informed and in control with our vibrant LED color display, offering clear and easy-to-read information on speed, battery life, and more at a glance.

Equipped with advanced damping and spring systems that absorb shocks and vibrations, providing a smooth and controlled ride. Adjust and fine-tune your suspension to suit your riding style and terrain.
Our 7-speed derailleur is designed for effortless and seamless gear shifts. Say goodbye to chain drops and frustrating transitions‚Äîthis derailleur ensures you're always in the right gear.

When the brakes are applied, the red tail light illuminates, alerting other riders to your actions. This increased visibility greatly enhances safety, especially during sudden stops or low-light conditions, ensuring a safer ride.
Illuminate your path like never before with two high-intensity bulbs. This headlight delivers twice the brightness, casting a powerful beam that cuts through the darkness.
These wide tires deliver unmatched traction and stability on various terrains, including sand, snow, and rough trails, ensuring a smooth and controlled ride.
Easily detach the battery for charging or storage. Its design ensures practicality and security, allowing extended rides with effortless recharging at home or on the go.
The thumb throttle delivers smooth, precise control over your e-bike's power output. Accelerate seamlessly and maintain your ideal speed with a simple press of your thumb.

The sturdy rear rack offers reliable cargo support, while the integrated fender keeps you and your bike clean by deflecting dirt and water. A practical combo for added utility and a more comfortable ride.

When the brakes are applied, the red tail light illuminates, alerting other drivers to your actions. This added visibility significantly enhances safety, especially during sudden stops or in low-light conditions, ensuring safe driving.
Our 7-speed derailleur is engineered to provide effortless and seamless gear transitions. Say goodbye to chain drops and frustrating shifts ‚Äì this derailleur ensures you're always in the right gear

Equipped with state-of-the-art damping and spring systems that absorb shocks and vibrations, delivering a smooth and controlled ride. Adjust &Fine-tune your suspension to match your riding style and terrain.
Our thumb throttle provides smooth and precise control over your electric bike's power output. Effortlessly accelerate and maintain your desired speed with a simple push of your thumb.
Illuminate your path like never before with not one, but two high-intensity bulbs. This headlight offers double the brightness, casting a powerful beam that cuts through darkness
Sleek and compact design not only complements aesthetics but also reduces clutter on your handlebars, providing a clean and unobstructed riding experience
Our 44T/48T crankset is engineered for maximum power transfer from your legs to the pedals, with perfect synergy on all PAS levels.
The soft and supple leather offers a comfortable and cushioned grip, reducing fatigue during long rides and ensuring a pleasant riding experience
Crafted from premium wood, the rack features a beautifully finished wood plank that not only holds your bags securely but also adds a rustic and timeless charm to any environment

settings.title: How long until I receive my bike?
settings.rich_content: The order will be process in 48 business hours. Once the order has shipped, a shipping confirmation email will be sent to your email. We use FedEx or UPS for shipping. Please allow 2~7 business days for the shipment to arrive to your designated location. Any delivery dates provided by Mokwheel are estimates.

settings.title: Do I need a license for riding Ebike?
settings.rich_content: No, you don‚Äôt need a license for riding Ebike. Please read Safety Instructions carefully for your safety.

settings.title: How do I charge my battery?
settings.rich_content: You can check the Battery and Charger of our E-BIKE USER MANUAL. The methods are listed in the manual with more detail.

settings.title: How to find the Ebike that fits me?
settings.rich_content: You can check our Compare Models for the differential of our Ebike.

settings.title: How to clean my Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We recommended you to take off the battery. Otherwise, you can clean the E-bike as the normal bike.

settings.title: What accessories come with Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We send a wrench, bicycle pump and front full fender, with our Ebike.

settings.faqs_question: What is an all-terrain fat tire electric bike?
settings.faqs_answer: An all-terrain fat tire electric bike is an e-bike equipped with extra-wide tires‚Äîusually between 3.8 to 4.8 inches‚Äîand a powerful motor system, built to handle various terrains such as sand, snow, mud, mountain trails, and city roads. The fat tires offer superior traction and shock absorption for a smoother, more stable ride. Combined with electric assist, it allows riders to conquer hills, rough surfaces, and unpredictable conditions with ease‚Äîmaking it a truly versatile bike for both urban and off-road adventures.

settings.faqs_question: What riding scenarios are Tor Plus electric bicycles best suited for?
settings.faqs_answer: The Tor Plus series is designed for riders who pursue all-terrain adaptability and strong performance. Whether it is daily commuting, rural riding, or complex terrain such as sand, snow, and forest roads, it can easily cope with it.

settings.faqs_question: What is the difference between Mesa Plus ST and Tor Plus? Which one should I choose?
settings.faqs_answer:
Mesa Plus ST is a low-span design (Step-Thru), which makes it easy to get on the bike and stable to stand, especially suitable for women or users with inconvenient legs;
Tor Plus is a high-span structure (Step-Over), with a more sporty riding posture, suitable for users who are accustomed to traditional mountain bike frames.

Mesa Plus ST is more suitable for women, middle-aged and elderly users or novice riders;
Tor Plus is more suitable for men, tall people or riders who like traditional mountain bike style.

Mesa Plus ST is more inclined to urban commuting, light leisure, and flat roads;
Tor Plus performs more steadily on mixed urban and rural roads, gravel/grass, and slightly complex terrain.
It is equipped with a hydraulic disc brake system, which feels light and has good emergency braking effect, suitable for mixed urban and unpaved routes.

settings.faqs_question: How does Tor Plus feel to ride?
settings.faqs_answer:
The overall riding experience of Tor Plus is solid and stable + sufficient power
The power response is fast, equipped with a speed sensor, the start is light, and the acceleration is direct, which is suitable for fast passing through intersections or speeding up when going uphill
The sitting position is slightly forward, which is closer to the mountain riding posture. With the high-cross frame, it brings a stronger sense of control and body participation
26√ó4.0-inch fat tire + 110mm shock-absorbing front fork, providing stable grip and shock absorption performance, and it is also stable when riding over gravel or grass.

settings.faqs_question: Are fat tires easy to break? How to maintain them?
settings.faqs_answer: Tor Plus uses high-quality wear-resistant and puncture-resistant tires. Just pay attention to maintaining the tire pressure within the normal range. Daily maintenance is simpler than ordinary electric bicycles.
